item.description:
Laurel Marsh Trail (about 3 mile loop): Long, mostly easy walk great for beginning hikers, some wet areas, a few small hills, great marsh views, water birds, mature forest, giant white pines, and mountain laurel.

Park at Laurel Marsh parking lot on south side of Middle Turnpike West (Route 44) just east of I-84, Exit 60, and meet there at 1 PM. The lot is not well marked but can be seen with a low but heavy wooden fence. The hike should take about 1.25 hour and be over by about 2:15 PM.

*Dogs on leash are fine if well behaved.*

The leader on this one is Gloria (http://hiking.meetup.... ) at (860) 306-5349. Any questions should be directed to her.

This event is in conjunction with the Hartford Heights Tall Club (http://socialnetwork.... ).

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Hike at Laurel Marsh Trail in Manchester CT
